content.p: , Faculty of Social Sciences Rahizah binti Sulaiman is a lecturer in Management and Business Ethics. She received her doctorate in Management from Massey University, New Zealand. Prior joining the academic field, Rahizah worked in the Malaysian private sector for 7 years. Rahizah's research interest is on ethical decision-making at workplaces, business ethics education and corporate social responsibility. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
